typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		SearchName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		OtherLanguages as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		SearchName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		OtherLanguages as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1 derive(isActive = 1) ~> addingActive
source2 select(mapColumn(
		SQL_PersonID = PersonID,
		FullName,
		PreferredName,
		SearchName,
		IsPermittedToLogon,
		LogonName,
		IsExternalLogonProvider,
		HashedPassword,
		IsSystemUser,
		IsEmployee,
		IsSalesperson,
		UserPreferences,
		PhoneNumber,
		FaxNumber,
		EmailAddress,
		Photo,
		CustomFields,
		OtherLanguages,
		LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
source1, Select1 lookup(PersonID == SQL_PersonID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(!isNull(SQL_PersonID)) ~> existing
existing select(mapColumn(
		PersonID,
		FullName = source1@FullName,
		PreferredName = source1@PreferredName,
		SearchName = source1@SearchName,
		IsPermittedToLogon = source1@IsPermittedToLogon,
		LogonName = source1@LogonName,
		IsExternalLogonProvider = source1@IsExternalLogonProvider,
		HashedPassword = source1@HashedPassword,
		IsSystemUser = source1@IsSystemUser,
		IsEmployee = source1@IsEmployee,
		IsSalesperson = source1@IsSalesperson,
		UserPreferences = source1@UserPreferences,
		PhoneNumber = source1@PhoneNumber,
		FaxNumber = source1@FaxNumber,
		EmailAddress = source1@EmailAddress,
		Photo = source1@Photo,
		CustomFields = source1@CustomFields,
		OtherLanguages = source1@OtherLanguages,
		LastEditedBy = source1@LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom = source1@ValidFrom,
		ValidTo = source1@ValidTo,
		SQL_PersonID,
		FullName = Select1@FullName,
		PreferredName = Select1@PreferredName,
		SearchName = Select1@SearchName,
		IsPermittedToLogon = Select1@IsPermittedToLogon,
		LogonName = Select1@LogonName,
		IsExternalLogonProvider = Select1@IsExternalLogonProvider,
		HashedPassword = Select1@HashedPassword,
		IsSystemUser = Select1@IsSystemUser,
		IsEmployee = Select1@IsEmployee,
		IsSalesperson = Select1@IsSalesperson,
		UserPreferences = Select1@UserPreferences,
		PhoneNumber = Select1@PhoneNumber,
		FaxNumber = Select1@FaxNumber,
		EmailAddress = Select1@EmailAddress,
		Photo = Select1@Photo,
		CustomFields = Select1@CustomFields,
		OtherLanguages = Select1@OtherLanguages,
		LastEditedBy = Select1@LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom = Select1@ValidFrom,
		ValidTo = Select1@ValidTo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive(FullName = 1==1) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
addingActive sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		SearchName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		OtherLanguages as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		SearchName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		OtherLanguages as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PersonID,
		FullName,
		PreferredName,
		SearchName,
		IsPermittedToLogon,
		LogonName,
		IsExternalLogonProvider,
		IsSystemUser,
		IsEmployee,
		IsSalesperson,
		UserPreferences,
		PhoneNumber,
		FaxNumber,
		EmailAddress,
		CustomFields,
		OtherLanguages,
		LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo
	)) ~> sink2
